tool.name: liftOver Chain

param.name: dbkey_from
param.label: dbkey 'from'
param.help: To liftover from e.g. hg18 to hg19, use 'hg18'

param.name: dbkey_to
param.label: dbkey 'to'
param.help: To liftover from e.g. hg18 to hg19, use 'hg19'

tool.help:
**What it does**
Fetches a liftOver chain file from UCSC.
